alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:55PM EDT until July 02 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Catoosa County in northwestern Georgia... North central Walker County in northwestern Georgia... Northeastern Dade County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 354 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wildwood, or 8 miles northeast of Trenton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ringgold, Fort Oglethorpe, Lookout Mountain, Chattanooga Valley, Fairview, Boynton, Lakeview, Indian Springs, Morganville, Graysville, Hooker and Wildwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
